name: Gun Runner (itch) (Nycelly, ULion)
description:
You are a Gun Runner, an agent hired by an interdimensional firearms organization, tasked to deliver weapons to its clients. The path to get there is filled with dangerous obstacles, but you are equipped with a firearm of your own.

Gun Runner is a 2D platformer game with a twist. The player can only use their gun to leap from place to place. Run, shoot, and propel your way through 15 levels to reach the drill.
